article_node.title: ‘Metal Gear Solid Delta’ PlayStation 5 Review: Better Than The Original
article_node.summary: The remake of Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater, titled Metal Gear Solid Delta, has been praised for its faithful recreation of the original game while incorporating modern gameplay elements and graphics using Unreal Engine 5. The remake retains the essence of the original, including its engaging story and memorable boss fights, while allowing players to choose between classic and modern control schemes. Notably, the remake was developed without the involvement of series creator Hideo Kojima, yet it demonstrates the talent and capability of the team at Konami to deliver a high-quality remake.
